agendas.event: Must be saved from the water eddy/afro.
Sneak attacks a Yonko.
Off-screens Luffy, Jinbe, and Chopper with DF powers.
Low-diffed by a stag beetle, is out of commission for a few chapters.
Has to resort to tricks to even land a hit on Vegapunk.
Sabo saves her from being seen or caught by royal guards.
No-diffed by Kizaru and is thrown into the light barrier.
Fights off Navy fodder and a couple of Vice Admirals.
Must be saved by Sanji from Pacifista and Vice Admirals.
Stabs Saturn (no damage).
Bodied by Saturnâ€™s eye powers, must later be saved by Kuma.
Confirmed to be 12 years old in the present day, meaning she is a haki user at age 12, and has took out 4 out of 9 vice admirals by herself at age 12.
Soloes a CP8 agent at age 10, then heads out to sea.
Failed attempt at a 'Nika-ish future'.
Realizes Luffy is Nika.
Turns Vice Admiral Pomsky and Hound into their useless child forms.
'Giant-like future' against Nusjuro (we don't know if this does anything).
Turns Vice Admiral Doll and Bluegrass into their useless child forms.
Becomes Nika 2.
Helps in the combo attack against Mars that removes him from the battlefield.
Combo attack against Saturn with Luffy.
